original: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Saṅgha! Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva mahāsattva!

original: de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /
translated: Having paid homage to them, this knowledge is spoken. May this knowledge be accomplished for me!🔽Tadyathā:

original: tadya th'a / ha ha ha sa ni /🔽ni pa sa ni /
analyzed: tadya th'a / ha ha ha sa ni / ni pa sa ni /

original: p'urba yo ga sma ra padma hast'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: p'urba yo ga sma ra padma hast'a ya sv'a h'a /

original: gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te /
translated: Whoever reads this knowledge will remember their births for a hundred thousand lifetimes.

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig sten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig sten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And after passing away from here, they will be reborn in the world of Sukhāvatī.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so //
translated: The essence of the noble Avalokiteśvara is complete.
